attributes.action: create a "People's Marathon", enabling general public applicants to run in the London 2012 Olympic marathon event (albeit with the official Olympic entrants given a slight head-start).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London 2012 Olympic Games must be globally unique and carry the goodwill of the 4 UK nations.

The London Marathon has become one of the most successful mass participation sporting events in the world. Such a mass participation event could be incorporated into the London 2012 official marathon competition, with thousands of Jo/ Joe Public entrants running the same course, albeit starting a few minutes after the official Olympic competitors. This would be truely unique to the London 2012 Olympic Games.

50,000 entrants would collectively raise atleast £50 million for charities across the UK, generate £2.5 million in entry fees plus merchandising, and invest at least ten million hours of sporting effort in training. What a legacy for London 2012.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
